title: QC Vision at the Edge: Reference Architecture and Evidence
summary: A reference design for on‑device QC vision with signed evidence and offline packaging.
bodyMd:
## Components
- Camera ingestion and preprocessing
- On‑device inference and thresholds
- Offline packaging (SBOM, signatures)
- Evidence cards for QA sign‑off

## KPIs
Sensitivity/specificity per defect class; rework savings; throughput impact.
